belongs_to_collection.name: Si Buta dari Gua Hantu - Collection

original_title: Si Buta Dari Goa Hantu: Lembah Tengkorak
overview: A warrior and his monkey companion put an end to the reign of a psychopathic and brutal despot after entering a village under his thumb.
title: The Blind Man from Ghost Cave: Valley of the Skeletons
